config.sql: SELECT(CASE WHEN CISMENU='0' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END) AS JRJG,B.SNAME AS JRJGMC,C.SNAME AS RZLX,NVL(FACT_A,0) AS JKBJ ,SSTARTDATE AS QSRQ,SENDDATE AS DQRQ,FACT_B AS LL,NVL(FACT_C,0) AS ZHCB,(CASE WHEN CISGUARANTEE='0' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END) AS SFJTDB ,D.SNAME AS DBFS,SREPAYDATE AS YHKRQ,E.SNAME AS HKLY,(CASE WHEN STATUS='-1' THEN '减少' WHEN STATUS='1' THEN '新增' ELSE '不符合条件' END)AS XZ_JS,SNOTE FROM DW_FACTFINANCEDETAIL A LEFT JOIN DW_DIMBANK B ON A.DIM_BANK=B.SCODE LEFT JOIN DW_DIMFINANCE C ON A.DIM_FINANCE = C.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='20') D ON A.DIM_GUARANTEE=D.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='21') E ON A.DIM_REPAYSOURCE=E.SCODE WHERE DIM_COMPANY=:company AND :period BETWEEN SUBSTR(SSTARTDATE,1,6) AND SUBSTR(SENDDATE,1,6) UNION ALL SELECT '小计' AS JRJG,'小计' AS JRJGMC,'小计' AS RZLX,SUM(NVL(FACT_A,0)) AS JKBJ,'' AS QSRQ,'' AS DQRQ, 0 AS LL, (CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(FACT_A,0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM(NVL(FACT_A,0)*NVL(FACT_C,0))/SUM(NVL(FACT_A,0))),4) END) AS ZHCB,''AS SFJTDB, '' AS DBFS,'' AS YHKRQ,''AS HKLY,'' AS XZ_JS,'' AS SNOTE FROM DW_FACTFINANCEDETAIL
